sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WF_IncidentUtils_Global_ClientCallable</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WF_IncidentUtils_Global_ClientCallable</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WF_IncidentUtils_Global_ClientCallable = Class.create();
WF_IncidentUtils_Global_ClientCallable.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    defaultActualStart: function() {
        var opened = this.getParameter('sysparm_opened');
        var gdt = new GlideDateTime(opened);
        var fniDate = gdt.getDisplayValue();
        return fniDate;
    },

    fetchINCdata: function() {
        var sht_desc;
        var desc;
        var curr_status;
        var result = [];
        var inc_SysID = this.getParameter('sysparm_INC_SysID');
        gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', inc_SysID);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            sht_desc = gr.short_description;
            result.push(sht_desc).toString();
            desc = gr.description;
            result.push(desc).toString();
            curr_status = gr.close_notes;
            result.push(curr_status).toString();
            result.push(new global.wf_get_costCenter().getCIOforAppServiceCI(gr.cmdb_ci)).toString();
            result.push(new global.wf_get_costCenter().getCIOdirectForAppServiceCI(gr.cmdb_ci)).toString();
            result.push(gr.business_impact).toString();
        }
        return result.toString();
    },

    type: 'WF_IncidentUtils_Global_ClientCallable'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>U181510</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-05-29 17:44:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>471fe12e874b69508d1065f70cbb3526</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WF_IncidentUtils_Global_ClientCallable</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_471fe12e874b69508d1065f70cbb3526</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:24:09</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
